paper_title.ja: ダブレット型粉体吸込みノズル入口形状に関する研究
paper_title.en: Study on Inlet Shape of Doublet Type Particles Suction Nozzle

description.ja: It was found that higher nozzle efficiency and loading ratio are obtained by mounting the injection port at the entrance of the suction nozzle. In order to improve the efficiency of the nozzle, the entrance shape of the suction nozzle is examined by changing the radius of the edge of the nozzle, as to reduce the large separation region created at the entrance of the nozzle. Furthermore, the sub-holes are mounted at the top of the injection nozzle and wider fluidization of the particles bed could be preformed. As a result, most provable nozzle shape is decided for the given conditions.
description.en: It was found that higher nozzle efficiency and loading ratio are obtained by mounting the injection port at the entrance of the suction nozzle. In order to improve the efficiency of the nozzle, the entrance shape of the suction nozzle is examined by changing the radius of the edge of the nozzle, as to reduce the large separation region created at the entrance of the nozzle. Furthermore, the sub-holes are mounted at the top of the injection nozzle and wider fluidization of the particles bed could be preformed. As a result, most provable nozzle shape is decided for the given conditions.

paper_title.en: Wavelet analysis of the near-field structure in a bounded jet

description.en: In order to reveal the flow structure of a turbulent bounded jet in both Fourier and physical spaces, the wavelet cross spectrum function is firstly proposed based on the wavelet transform in this paper. Then, the wavelet transform, local wavelet Reynolds stress and wavelet Reynolds stress are used to analyze the large eddy motions and the secondary flow structure over a measured frequency-physical plane. The experimental fluctuating velocities at various positions in the near-field are used for the analyses. From wavelet Reynolds stress analysis, the frequency and location of the large-scale motion in the shear layer and the secondary flow near the wall can be determined. The branching structure of multi-scale eddies in the wall shear layer becomes more complex than that in the free shear layer. Due to the effect of the secondary flow, the scales of eddy and entrainment process become small.

publication_name.en: TRANSACTIONS OF THE JAPAN SOCIETY FOR AERONAUTICAL AND SPACE SCIENCES

paper_title.ja: 環状吸込流を付加した円形働突噴流の流動および伝熱特性(自由噴流の遷移および発達領域に働突壁が設置された場合)
環状吸込流を付加した円形自由噴流の流動特性(噴流速度の影響)
paper_title.en: Flow Characteristics on Circular Free Jet Added Annular Suction Flow:Effect of Jet Velocity

description.ja: The effects of the jet velocity on the flow characteristics of the circular free jet added the annular suction flow were examined, provided that the velocity ratio of the suction velocity to the jet velocity is the same. The two-dimensional flow field was measured by PIV, and the pass frequency of vortices was analyzed by FFT analyzer using a hot wire. As a result, it was found that the time mean velocity and turbulent statistical values of the flow field in the vicinity of the exit of the pipe are approximately the same in all cases of the jet velocity. Therefore, it was clarified that the velocity ratio is one of parameter that dominates the diffusion phenomenon. It was found that the pass frequency of the vortices is observed clearly in the velocity ratio more than 0.84. As the Strouhal number shows almost a fixed value in all cases of the jet velocity, similarity of the unsteady flow was also confirmed.
description.en: The effects of the jet velocity on the flow characteristics of the circular free jet added the annular suction flow were examined, provided that the velocity ratio of the suction velocity to the jet velocity is the same. The two-dimensional flow field was measured by PIV, and the pass frequency of vortices was analyzed by FFT analyzer using a hot wire. As a result, it was found that the time mean velocity and turbulent statistical values of the flow field in the vicinity of the exit of the pipe are approximately the same in all cases of the jet velocity. Therefore, it was clarified that the velocity ratio is one of parameter that dominates the diffusion phenomenon. It was found that the pass frequency of the vortices is observed clearly in the velocity ratio more than 0.84. As the Strouhal number shows almost a fixed value in all cases of the jet velocity, similarity of the unsteady flow was also confirmed.

paper_title.ja: 吹出し口を備えた粉粒体吸込みノズル内の流れの可視化
paper_title.en: Flow Visualization of a Particle Nozzle with an Injection Port

description.ja: In the pneumatic transportation, the experiments of the particles collecting unit were carried out by mounting the injection flow at the center of the suction nozzle. It was found by flow visualization that the injection flow progresses the fluidization of the particles bed. As a quantitative parameter, a fluidized volume is introduced and show the effect of the injection flow upon the collection of particles. It was found that these exists the most probable flow rate of injection.
description.en: In the pneumatic transportation, the experiments of the particles collecting unit were carried out by mounting the injection flow at the center of the suction nozzle. It was found by flow visualization that the injection flow progresses the fluidization of the particles bed. As a quantitative parameter, a fluidized volume is introduced and show the effect of the injection flow upon the collection of particles. It was found that these exists the most probable flow rate of injection.
